ai-patthana21.3:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles, sometimes the top of the Dhamma is given to him:
ai-patthana21.3:0.3_0: connected with the roots, (wrong) the roots of the skillful,
ai-patthana21.3:1.1_0: They don’t are unprofitable rooted in skillful qualities, or skilled in opposite sense to the object.
ai-patthana21.3:1.1_1: nine supports for the object, and there is nine projects.
ai-patthana21.3:2.1_0: They don’t are unshakable for the sake of profitable root and the skilled in opposite sex. It is a condition for the sake of the teaching.
ai-patthana21.3:2.1_1: nine supports for the object, and there is nine projects.
ai-patthana21.3:3.1_0: They don’t are unshakable for the sake of profitable roots and associated with the cause, and for the sake of prevailling the Dhamma. This is a condition for the reason why only three, and for the sake of the Dhamma,
ai-patthana21.3:3.1_1: Nine their objects there is nothing between the past, but the future when it is arrived, there is no nine orifices nine deeds.
